name: Lighting the Way
description:
WADS or arrow keys to move green flag to start and restart game.  Avoid projectiles and try to touch the boss in boss fight.  y to enter colosseum when prompted.

Story: you are Gerald a time traveler from the far future to investigate 2023 but your time machine broke down and time is being messed up. collect lightbulbs to fix your machine and beat the final boss
